reviews.text: One of the best experiences that I had really highly recommend this establishment!!!
Food was phenomenal, very fresh. Very well prepared. Definitely try the chicken tacos, the pastrami burger and the homemade fries were amazing. 10/10 üî•
They have really good food fresh and tasty meals one hundred percent you should try it
My first time walking in to this place was so amazing , the food the bomb , worth every penny .
This place has the best food in Brooklyn! Cozy and small with great service ,and they have a must try brisket pizza ! Highly recommend!
Great food
Really loved the Banh Mi Bowl!
Amazing food, truly a hidden gem! Has something on the menu for everyone.
Great food!
service was great. Great food people and good service, would definitely come back.
They have really good food and reasonable prices. Foods ready in 10 minutes and the staff are really friendly. I 100% recommend

La Sova has some nerve. I came in expecting a normal meal and instead was ambushed by a pastrami burger so indecently good I'm still questioning my life choices. The guac and chips? Criminally fresh, like Jonathan himself was back there bullying avocados into peak ripeness. My mom's burrito bowl? A disgrace - every bite balanced, seasoned, and satisfying enough to make her glare at me for trying to steal more than one forkful.

And then there's Jonathan. The man had the gall to deliver excellent service checking in at the exact right moments, making us feel welcome without smothering us, and somehow pulling off genuine hospitality in an age of dead eyed waitstaff. It's disturbing, really.

Zero stars for ruining other restaurants for me. Five stars because La Sova is already living rent free in my head. Jonathan, you've officially set the bar way too high.
Good food and great service!
So delicious! Generous and kind staff. Seriously amazing burrito that tastes as good as the pictures look.
Great food, amazing service!
The food here is always fresh and good. The portions can be a bit small so bring a smaller appetite or a bigger wallet! Worth the visit.

This place is amazing. We drove from Long Island and it was worth the effort. Jonathan was very hospitable and helpful. Service was excellent! We started by sharing the Loaded fries and homemade Tortilla chips and nachos. So delicious! We also enjoyed the Bahn Mi Bowl and Ribeye Philly and Beef Tacos. Everyone was happy, raving that their food was truly delicious and unique. So great. We already looking forward to coming back! Highly recommend this food and dining experience.
Really good food! A tiny but so cozy place. The owner Yonatan was friendly and inviting! The quality for each dish we took was incredible! Highly recommended!
Great food great people
Great food! and even better customer service, highly recommended.
Delicious food, great service, and amazing sesame chicken.
Great food with great service, recommend if you‚Äôre looking to get the best of the best take out, this is the spot.
Great food, nice and clean space . Will come back again

Great spot! Fresh food, fast service, friendly people :)
Burrito Bowls are a great, healthy lunch option!
Great food! Great menu! Can't find some of their specialty items on any other menu

Amazing service. Delicious food
Really good

Amazing Service The food is phenomenal
Especially the Belgium fries never had such good fries
I was very shocked with such good service very good food. Thanks so much hope to be there again shortly

For the people that are hesitating like I was- GO FOR IT! Food was fresh and delicious. The only reason I couldn‚Äôt give a 5 was because I expected more meat in my burrito but otherwise I can‚Äôt wait to try more from their menu!
Incredible food AND customer service!!! Highly recommend!
So insane best tacos I‚Äôve had in a very long time worth every cent
Very kind and resourceful, helpful; great welcoming  and assuring.

The food was really good and Yonaton was very friendly and kind. From the time we entered to the time we left his energy was positive. I appreciate his service and the food. We look forward to eating there again.
Amazing, amazing, amazing!!! 10/10 food is phenomenal. The service here is beautiful, treated very nice and the quality of the food is really good. Would recommend
Delicious! Make sure to try all sauces!
Amazing food recommend the burrito !

I had the banh mi salad, and it was absolutely incredible. The salad and chicken ratio was perfect. And let me tell you, the sauces were fantastic! Each one complemented my dish beautifully. If you‚Äôre choosing a sauce, I highly recommend the jalape√±o sauce. My friend had the chicken lime rice bowl, and he thoroughly enjoyed it as well. This place is the perfect low-key date spot for a special date, whether it‚Äôs your 4th or 5th date.
amazing food very fresh great service very clean  shutout to yontan
The quality of the food is so great!!! A 10/10
Incredible

The dirty fries were so mouthwatering, it was heaven. And it had that perfect kick loved every bite.
The poppers were so tasty, loved that honey twist, woof.

I highly recommend this eatery, great food, great prices, nicely wrapped. I'm now happily full. I can hear my stomach thanking me.

We recently visited La‚ÄØSova and had a very enjoyable experience. From the moment we walked in, the service stood out ‚Äî friendly, prompt, and attentive without being intrusive. That kind of hospitality instantly sets the tone for a good meal.

For food, we ordered a burrito and a plate of loaded fries. The burrito was hearty with well‚Äëbalanced fillings (the wrap was fresh and wrapped nicely) and the sauces served on the side were a highlight: flavorful, well‚Äëseasoned, and they complemented the dishes rather than overpowering them. The loaded fries were fun and indulgent ‚Äî crispy fries generously topped, and again the sauces elevated the dish.

The overall vibe was relaxed and comfortable. It felt like a place you could go for a casual meal with friends and enjoy really good flavors without any pretension. Value‚Äëwise, based on what we got and the service we received, it felt more than fair.

It‚Äôs a really nice and cozy place
The service is really quick and staff really nice
The food is delicious, every bite is perfect,
and the flavor‚Ä¶üëåüëåüëå
It‚Äôs the type of place you want to come back again and againüòäüòä

Hey La Sova its Netanel (aka the cake boy lol), I appreciate the effort you guys went through for getting that cake and all of that but also I got the loaded fries and aside from the onions because I don't like onions so I just plucked them out it was mad tasty! Fries tasted mad good the salami was tasty and the spicy thing that was on it was the best! I see why you guys have 750+ 5 star reviews and y'all have only be open for a year or so I was told. Ty again and best of luck to all of you!
The food is incredible and different

I absolutely loved the borrito I got the pulled beef and wow the celantro ric was perfect the French fries are hot and crispy the chicken wings are actually amazing there spicy and they make the sauce in the store liget wow the nachos had the perfect amount of everything great service must try if you love Mexican food
Amazing food! Friendly staff! Would 100% recommend!
The food was delicious and the environment was welcoming and pleasant. The owner makes you feel welcome and it‚Äôs clear that he just wants you to enjoy.
Delicious and quick service!
The owner was super kind. Lovely place to eat in with friends, or to get take out. I ordered the burrito bowl; I would recommend! Very delicious and flavorful.

The Chicken Ceasar Salad is delicious!!
Perfect proportion size and part of the lunch deal with a drink so a great price also!
They were super busy when I went in to order and they still got my food out quickly!
Highly recommend üòÅüëç

Food, service, and atmosphere were all a 5 star. I got a rice bowl and a chicken sandwich and both were amazing. On top of that they gave us free chicken wings which were so good. The service was extremely nice and they really did a great job making sure everything was perfect. Definitely a spot I‚Äôll be coming back to.

Dinner and the aesthetic of the restaurant are amazing. The burrito, the rice, the chicken, the nachos, basically everything on the menu are fantastic! 100% recommend, great food, great staff, and overall fire eats!!!

Was looking far and wide for a good Kosher burrito and was excited to discover this place.

The chicken burrito I got  was flavorful and the ingredients felt clean/fresh. The sauces were a step above, offering bold and true flavors that complimented the burrito well.

Service was very quick and friendly

Will definitely be back to try other items!

I drove over an hour just to try this spot‚Äîand WOW, it was more than worth it. The popper salad was out of this world! The chicken was crispy, juicy, and perfectly sauced with a sweet heat that paired amazingly with the fresh, crunchy lettuce and pickles. Every bite had me wanting more.

And don‚Äôt even get me started on the rice cholent‚Äîinsanely good! It was rich, flavorful, and comforting in all the right ways. You can tell they put a lot of love and care into their food.

If you‚Äôre even thinking about trying this place, stop hesitating. This is comfort food done right. 10/10, will definitely be coming back again!

Our family review

The CHICKEN FINGERS ARE IRRESISTIBLE
~ yishai
The burrito and chicken fingers Are. So. GOOD! ~ Ayala
the chicken fingers are SO GOOD the fries were delicious and the homemade crispy noodles are Awesome!!! ~ Atara

Small cozy store. Super friendly and clean.
Food was made fresh. Highly recommend this place.  On east 13th st right off Ave M in Brooklyn. Priced very well especially considering the food is made fresh on the spot.

There are so many places in Brooklyn to eat out from but I‚Äôm glad I chose LA SOVA!! the food is so fresh and it‚Äôs such great quality and taste AMAZING. And I love how everything is made in house which I love!!! And of course THANK YOU to the workers that are very kind and provide great service!
Everything was delicious! I got the $15 lunch special with sesame chicken and a soda. The service was also amazing. Jonathan and Amnon took great care of us. :)

The staff are incredibly friendly, welcoming, and hospitable, making it a feel right at home vibe.
The food was absolutely delicious‚Äîvibrant, creative, and packed with flavor. The hosts were awesome, and the vibes were fantastic. Highly recommend this for anyone who appreciates different varieties and flavor pairings without compromising quality. Can't wait to come back again!

I had the crispy chicken sandwich with the homemade pulled brisket atop, Belgian style chips and a drink! Highly recommend

My family and I recently had the pleasure of dining at La Sova, and it was an outstanding experience from start to finish. Although the restaurant doesn‚Äôt usually have a designated dining area, they went out of their way to set up a charming outdoor space to accommodate our family of six. This thoughtful gesture made our meal feel even more special. The food was exceptional‚Äîevery dish was expertly prepared with fresh, high-quality ingredients, and the flavors were truly memorable. Despite the unique setup, the service was flawless; the staff were attentive, friendly, and made sure we had everything we needed to enjoy our meal. The extra effort they put into making us feel welcome and comfortable did not go unnoticed. La Sova exceeded our expectations in every way, and we‚Äôll definitely be returning. I highly recommend La Sova for anyone looking for delicious food and top-notch service, especially if you're looking for a place that goes the extra mile to accommodate its guests!
They have a great variety of healthy and fresh salads, rice bowls and sandwiches. I've enjoyed everything I've tried. Service has been friendly and kind. Highly recommend!

Awesome place!! This is our 3rd time coming here and each time has been a great experience! Each time we have come my son has gotten a different kind of burger and each time it has been amazing. This time he got a smash burger and it was delicious! My other most picky son who never eats out anywhere has been begging to come back every time. He got the chicken fingers and they were amazingly crispy and so good. Each one got their meals with fries as well. I absolutely love their Chinese food menu as well it‚Äôs what I always get every time I come. First two times I got the sesame chicken with fried rice and this time around I got the chicken and broccoli which also comes with fried rice!! Oh have I mentioned that the fried rice is amazing!! Generally not everyone knows how to make fried rice but at this place they definitely know what they are doing. It‚Äôs a definitely you should try! (:
Fresh, tasty kosher food with great service. Perfect spot for takeout or a quick bite ‚Äî you‚Äôve got to try the tacos!

Perfect. The taste. The Temperature. The vibes. The food here is amazing the service is incredible. I ate the beef and broccoli with white rice, lemme say, 1000/10. The owners are amazing people. Thanks for the service and the extra fresh food!!! Even though they‚Äôre a takeout only place, they actually let me sit in and eat this incredible incredible food thank you. I love you.
Delicious food here, friendly people and they make food with love and passion, highly recommended!

Hidden behind a tree in Brooklyn, La Sova is one of those hidden gems you feel lucky to stumble upon. It‚Äôs the kind of place where the owner doesn‚Äôt just serve you food but is willing to chat and share the story and inspiration behind each dish. That personal touch made the whole experience feel extra special for us. We came in as a family of ten on the night before a wedding (we pretty much filled the place), and the little restaurant was filled with our laughter and plates of incredible food. The Mexican food was the favorite. The portions were generous, the prices more than fair, and every dish had us reaching across the table to share (or take) from our siblings.. The food was so good, in fact, that my daughter and new son-in-law (both gluten-free) got hungry before the wedding and ordered again the very next day for delivery, and once again, La Sova delivered (literally and figuratively). If you‚Äôre looking for authentic, fresh flavors, warm hospitality, and a place that feels like a secret worth sharing, give this place a try. It‚Äôs the kind of restaurant you‚Äôll want to come back to and tell your friends about. Enjoy!

I had a great experience at La Sova in Brooklyn. The atmosphere was warm and inviting ‚Äî perfect for a relaxed meal but still with a touch of style. The real highlight, though, was the burger. Juicy, flavorful, and cooked just right ‚Äî hands down one of the best I‚Äôve had in the city. Great vibe, amazing food‚Ä¶ I‚Äôll definitely be coming back!

This place is without a second thought a gem! The variety along with the quality of the food is not something you come by often.the service was beyond expectations that even a Karen would be satisfied. I also love how they have a tray in the fridge of a wild variety is sauces on the side for you to see and reach. simple and genius, would definitely recommend!!

I decided to make dinner for my wife since it was her birthday but I never cooked dinner before. I got La Sova just in case I burned dinner. I ended up doing an ok job but the highlight was still La Sova lol. Food was phenomenal.

The food here is amazing, Every order is prepared freshly on the spot. Huge variety to choos from, awesome menu.
Amazing and friendly customer service.
This place is a hidden gem üíé
A must try!

Absolutely loved this place. The Caesar salad was incredible and had chicken, avocado and amazing little croutons on it. The staff was so friendly and I will definitely be returning on my next trip to Brooklyn

I want to give this a 10/10 but I guess I‚Äôll settle for 5/5 :) We were offered a place to dine in right away and our meal was served in just a few minutes. I highly recommend the burrito bowls and they are big enough to feed two. I never thought there would be a kosher food place with such variety. Definitely worth a trip.

Just ate at Solva for the second time, and had a fantastic experience again. Had the Mexican dishes the first time. This time the pastrami burger and banh mi. Delicious, and reasonably priced. The chefs put a love of into their food, and all the items are great. The staff is pleasant. The restaurant is a true gem.

Delicious food. With fantastic and joyful service!
Everything on the menu is great!
This place is legit! Nachos are a must have. Staff is super nice and accommodating!

I wanted a homemade chicken soup without having to cook. La Sova was suggested.
It did not disappoint!
When it comes to homemade chicken soup they really know how to make it so‚Ä¶

This was my third time ordering from La Sova. The food was excellent!
I ordered the Smash Burger which was juicy and cooked perfectly and the Beef Tacos which were very tasty and delicious. My wife ordered the Burrito and said it was one of the best things she has ever tasted! The service was excellent as well. We will definitely be ordering from here again!

I recently visited this restaurant and had an amazing experience! I tried the nacho bowl, and it was absolutely incredible‚Äîpacked with flavor. The workers was super sweet. The food overall was fantastic, and the loaded fries were fresh and delicious. Highly recommend!

This is a real gem that you can easily miss, but don't let the size of the store fool you. They make everything fresh and in-house, and the food is delicious. It's a bit pricey, but kosher meat usually is. Well worth it, though.
I got their shwarma wrap special and loved it.
This is the most warm and comfortable restaurant I have ever been to.„ÄÇThe food is very fresh and delicious.

Got the Thursday night cholent plate. The cholent was very flavorful, the potato kugal was soft and not dry at all. It definitely had a good taste. The kishka was homemade and not prepackaged and actually was also very good. The kugal was the best part of it. Both the man at the counter and someone from the kitchen who came out to ask how it was were very nice and helpful. They added a couple of tables and some chairs so was able to eat inside!

I LOVE this place. Great pastrami burger and burrito! My only critiques are that the pulled beef from the tacos are a bit dry and that they don‚Äôt give more sauces with burrito unless you pay. Otherwise, highly recommend
What a fantastic experience! I‚Äôd give 20 stars if I could! Delicious food! Plus excellent and superb service! Was my son‚Äôs birthday and they went out of their way to make it special!

The loaded fries is crazyyyy
The smash burger is really big, delicious!!!
Good prices, I will come back for sure.
Thank you!!! ü§©ü§©ü§©

Small pleasant , bright,
Clean place that does mostly takeout and delivery ( though they have 2 tables) food is good!  Fresh, tasty. You can get the usual things ( like hamburger) or if you want something a little more imaginative there are options like a Vietnamese rice bowl with chicken & veggies (which I got and enjoyed). It‚Äôs kind of hidden on e12st between elm &Ave m ,so it‚Äôs easy to
Miss if you‚Äôre not looking   Owner is a nice guy,
Just had a great meal here! The chicken fingers were spot-on crispy and the burger was delicious too. Definitely recommend if you‚Äôre looking for a tasty and satisfying bite!

Food was delicious. Had a rice bowl and we couldn't get enough of it. The sesame chicken with fried rice was the highlight though. The food came out quickly and was fresh. Amnon went above and beyond walking me through the menu and getting whatever we needed before we even asked.

We had such an amazing experience at LA Sova tonight! We ordered the special burger, pulled beef tacos, loaded nachos, and the beef burrito‚Äîevery single dish was absolutely delicious and packed with flavor. The portions were generous, and the presentation was beautiful.

What truly made the night stand out was the service. The owner is a true mentch and gentleman‚Äîso kind, welcoming, and attentive. He genuinely cared that we were happy with everything and went above and beyond, even giving us cornflake chicken fingers on the house (which were also amazing!).

Highly recommend LA Sova for both the incredible food and the warm, top-notch hospitality. Can‚Äôt wait to come back! Thank you so much!!
